com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.graphics.shape

Class Cube

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelInstance
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.graphics.Model3D

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.RenderableProvider, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class Cube
extends Shape3D
    An extension of the Shape3D class that creates a cube.
    Author:
    Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

        public Cube(float width,
            float height,
            float depth,
            com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Creates a cube by providing its dimensions and color.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the cube.
        height - The height of the cube.
        depth - The depth/girth of the cube.
        color - The color of the cube.

      • Cube

        public Cube(float width,
            float height,
            float depth,
            com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
        Generates a cube by providing its dimensions and the wrapping texture.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the cube.
        height - The height of the cube.
        depth - The depth/girth of the cube.
        texture - The wrapping texture applied to the cube.

      • Cube

            float width,

        Generates a cube by providing its model instance and dimensions.
        Parameters:
        modelInstance - The model instance to get the model from.
        width - The width of the cube.
        height - The height of the cube.
        depth - The depth/girth of the cube.

        height - The height of the cube.
        depth - The depth/girth of the cube.
